meanings.definition: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever.
meanings.sent1: I took ibuprofen for my headache.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed ibuprofen for my muscle pain.
meanings.sent3: Why did the fever take ibuprofen? To cool down!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like ibuprofen for his emotional pain.
meanings.sent5: The ibuprofen worked like magic on my backache.
